g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_22499951-3c4b-43a1-ab78-9bad203d15d8
g.text: 158 [when: not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy")ansible_os_family == "RedHat" and not rhelaidedb.stat.exists]

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_444b1cff-43bd-4189-bbf2-bb6115a0cc15
g.text: 160 [when: not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy")ansible_os_family == "RedHat" and not rhelaidedbnew.stat.exists]

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_1bb5fc5a-0242-4312-9072-4037037264d4
g.text: 161 [when: not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy")ansible_os_family == "Debian" and not ubuaidedb.stat.exists]
